titleInfo.title: WAS COMMITTED to the Parish Prison

mods.abstract: WAS COMMITTED to the Parish Jail of the Parish of Jefferson, on the 29th of November, 1869, DANIEL a black 5 feet 7 inches high; Also, the boy JACOB, a black 5 feet 7 1/2 inches high; they say they belong to Mr. Whitehead of St. Charles. The owner is requested to come forward, prove property, pay charges and take them away. GUY DREUX, Sheriff of the Parish of Jefferson. dec1

detail.title: The Carrollton sun. : (City of Carrollton, Parish of Jefferson, La.) 185?-1???

mods.accessCondition: Please submit an LSU Special Collections reference ticket at https://askus.lib.lsu.edu/special for any questions or comments about this digital object.

mods.note: Louisiana Runaway Slave Advertisements, 1836-1865, Louisiana Digital Library, Baton Rouge, La.
